rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses factual language ('resulted in the culling'), lacking high-potency framing.
Contains scale ('more than 23 million') and containment verb ('culling'), which is Neutral.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports culling numbers (negative fact) but contains no explicit calming cue.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a response measure and its scale ('resulted in the culling of more than 23 million poultry').
